snippet: Chinese authorities have closed nearly two dozen retail stores of South Korea's Lotte Group following inspections, ramping up pressure on the conglomerate amid a diplomatic standoff that has cast a chill over business ties between the two nations....

headline.main: Aberdeen CEO Says Standard Life Deal Will Lead to Some Job Losses
headline.print_headline: Aberdeen CEO Says Standard Life Deal Will Lead to Some Job Losses

lead_paragraph: Chinese authorities have closed nearly two dozen retail stores of South Korea's Lotte Group following inspections, ramping up pressure on the conglomerate amid a diplomatic standoff that has cast a chill over business ties between the two nations.
